vote.title: Authorize an increase to the master agreement with Motorola Solutions, Inc., for the purchase of radios and accessories and to extend the term from December 13, 2022 to December 12, 2023 - Not to exceed $1,803,407.00, from $72,612,042.85 to $74,415,449.85 - Financing: Communication Services Fund ($903,407.00) and Master Lease Equipment Fund ($900,000.00) (subject to annual appropriations)
